Read Social Care Alarms Telecare data

Source: R/read_sc_all_alarms_telecare.R
read_sc_all_alarms_telecare.Rd

Read Social Care Alarms Telecare data

Usage

read_sc_all_alarms_telecare(
  sc_dvprod_connection = phs_db_connection(dsn = "DVPROD")
)

Arguments

sc_dvprod_connection

Connection to the SC platform

Value

an extract of the data as a tibble.

On this page

Developed by Public Health Scotland, Megan McNicol, Jennifer Thom, Zihao Li.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
